pr_title: Minor fixes and improvements in device registry integration tests

timeline.message:
Minor fixes and improvements in device registry integration tests
 - Fixed java doc
 - Removed unused constants
 - Used context specific methods
 - Removed redundant local variables

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText: this would probably better be initialized as part of the @BeforeEach method ...
timeline.author: sophokles73

timeline.message:
